cause.description:
So here is the situation ... a group of college friends (Austin, Tom, Kelly, and Paul) are going to bicycle 1,000 miles in 10 days to raise money for childhood cancer research and honor local kids fighting cancer in 5 cities.
and... although they have their doubts about how much money can actually be raised through facebook ... they felt compelled to try this "cause" thing to get their friends to ...
Sponsor them for a meager 1 penny per mile ($10.00) to help them meet their goal ... come on guys ... that's like the cost of a movie ticket ...
http://www.rallyacrossamerica.org
1. Childhood cancer is the #1 disease killer of kids ages 0-20 in America.
2. Every day, 46 kids are diagnosed with childhood cancer.
3. Childhood cancer is different than adult cancer and thus requires different research.
cause.name: Rally Across America
